title: SPOT!: Map-Guided LLM Agent for Unsupervised Multi-CCTV Dynamic Object Tracking
summary: CCTV-based vehicle tracking systems face structural limitations in continuously connecting the trajectories of the same vehicle across multiple camera environments. In particular, blind spots occur due to the intervals between CCTVs and limited Fields of View (FOV), which leads to object ID switching and trajectory loss, thereby reducing the reliability of real-time path prediction.
